title: Riot please consider this Kalista skin!

embed.description: A League skin I designed for fun

body:
Kalista desperately needs more skins, this skin looks absolutely amazing: Elderwood Kalista >> https://www.kelseym.com/projects/z3dwm

Also, this sewn chaos Kalista is really different and interesting as well rather than just a colour variation on a theme: https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/007/359/770/large/fredrik-hagg-sewnchaoskalista.jpg?1505591437

Also consider Porgram Kalista and Project Kalista please lol :)
